workflow.name: Social Media Brand Monitoring & Auto-Reply Workflow

values.content: You are a brand monitoring assistant. Analyze the sentiment of social media mentions and draft personalized replies in the brand's voice. Return JSON with: sentiment (positive/negative/neutral), confidence (0-1), summary, and draft_reply.

parameters.columns: platform, author, content, url, sentiment, confidence, summary, draft_reply, created_at

buildPhases.description: Initiates the workflow every 30 minutes to monitor social media platforms for brand mentions and keyword tracking.
Simultaneously searches Twitter and LinkedIn for brand mentions and relevant keywords, collecting posts and engagement data from both platforms.
Analyzes collected social media mentions using AI to determine sentiment, generate summaries, and create personalized draft replies in the brand's voice.
Stores the processed social media mentions along with sentiment analysis and draft replies in PostgreSQL database for historical tracking.
Sends formatted notifications to Slack channel with mention details, sentiment analysis, and draft replies ready for human approval and response.

message.message: Invalid value for 'operation'. Must be one of: complete
message.fix: Change operation to one of the valid options

message.message: Required property 'Send Message To' is missing

errors.message: Expression error: values: Nested expressions are not supported
Expression error: text: Nested expressions are not supported
Workflow validation failed: e.message.includes is not a function

warnings.message: Consider adding error handling to your workflow

reasoning: Fixed AI Sentiment Analysis: Changed typeVersion from 1.3 to 1.1 (maximum supported), changed operation from 'message' to 'complete' (valid option), and converted nested expressions to single template literal format
Fixed Slack Notification: Added required 'select' property set to 'channel', updated typeVersion from 2.1 to 2.3 (latest), and converted nested expressions to single template literal format
Fixed Store Results: Updated typeVersion from 2.4 to 2.6 (latest) and converted nested expressions in values field to single template literal format
Fixed Slack node by changing 'channel' parameter to 'channelId' as required by the Slack node configuration
Fixed Store Results node by converting template literal syntax to string concatenation using + operators, as n8n doesn't support ${} template literals in expressions
The workflow validation error about 'e.message.includes is not a function' appears to be a system-level issue that should resolve once the node-level expression errors are fixed

warnings.message: Consider adding error handling to your workflow

old.userPrompt: ‚ÄúMonitor LinkedIn and Twitter for mentions of my brand or product keywords, summarize the sentiment, and auto-draft a reply in my voice, ready for approval.‚Äù

workflow.name: Social Media Brand Monitoring & Auto-Reply Workflow

values.content: You are a brand monitoring assistant. Analyze the sentiment of social media mentions and draft personalized replies in the brand's voice. Return JSON with: sentiment (positive/negative/neutral), confidence (0-1), summary, and draft_reply.

parameters.columns: platform, author, content, url, sentiment, confidence, summary, draft_reply, created_at

buildPhases.description: Initiates the workflow every 30 minutes to monitor social media platforms for brand mentions and keyword tracking.
Simultaneously searches Twitter and LinkedIn for brand mentions and relevant keywords, collecting posts and engagement data from both platforms.
Analyzes collected social media mentions using AI to determine sentiment, generate summaries, and create personalized draft replies in the brand's voice.
Stores the processed social media mentions along with sentiment analysis and draft replies in PostgreSQL database for historical tracking.
Sends formatted notifications to Slack channel with mention details, sentiment analysis, and draft replies ready for human approval and response.

Send a message to an AI model and get response

values.content: You are a social media manager analyzing brand mentions. For each mention, provide: 1) Sentiment analysis (positive/negative/neutral with confidence score), 2) Key themes/topics mentioned, 3) A draft reply in a professional yet personable tone that acknowledges the mention appropriately. Keep replies concise and authentic.

operationHistory.purpose: Send a message to an AI model and get response
operationHistory.reasoning: Upgraded model from gpt-3.5-turbo to gpt-4 for better sentiment analysis and more nuanced reply generation

## üì• Triggers
Initiates the workflow every 30 minutes to monitor social media platforms for brand mentions and keyword tracking.

## üìä Inputs
Simultaneously searches Twitter and LinkedIn for brand mentions and relevant keywords, collecting posts and engagement data from both platforms.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Transform
Analyzes collected social media mentions using AI to determine sentiment, generate summaries, and create personalized draft replies in the brand's voice.

## üíæ Storage
Stores the processed social media mentions along with sentiment analysis and draft replies in PostgreSQL database for historical tracking.

## üöÄ Outputs
Sends formatted notifications to Slack channel with mention details, sentiment analysis, and draft replies ready for human approval and response.

## üöÄ Grow your AI business

Need help in implementing this workflow for your business? Join the Ghost Team community.

This workflow is made with üíö by Ghost Team.

Simultaneously searches Twitter and LinkedIn for brand mentions and relevant keywords, collecting posts and engagement data from both platforms.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Transform
Analyzes collected social media mentions using AI to determine sentiment, generate summaries, and create personalized draft replies in the brand's voice.

## üíæ Storage
Stores the processed social media mentions along with sentiment analysis and draft replies in PostgreSQL database for historical tracking.

## üöÄ Outputs
Sends formatted notifications to Slack channel with mention details, sentiment analysis, and draft replies ready for human approval and response.
